channel.title: Cobblestone
channel.description:
Anyone got a good diagram for a good cobblestone generator?
Also, does anyone wanna sell a chest full of cobblestone (or give it to me? :D). Name your price and I'll try to get it.

item.title: Cobblestone
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You can come out to my place and see mine, it’s the best design I’ve seen so far, you can literally just put something heavy on your mouse button and get unlimited cobble (mines 2 at a time). When building my castle, I used to build during the day, and mine cobble at night, and I’d always get 3-4 stacks or more, with a stone pick. (more than I could place during the day most of the time :))

Though I’m thinking it can be improved somewhat with pistons, but I’ll be waiting until they are enabled on the server to try it out.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:


It’s a pretty simple generator, but it works.
